metadata.name: Blue Aura
metadata.description: "Blue Aura" draws inspiration from Hype Williams' cinematography style in the movie Belly, using blue light to create a dreamy and otherworldly aesthetic. The collection creates a surreal atmosphere that invites the viewer to contemplate the beauty of black skin in a captivating way. With shadows and contrasts, "Blue Aura" pays homage to Belly's lasting impact on the world of art and culture, and showcases the enduring power of film to inspire new forms of creative expression.
